attributes.action: ban the advertising of plastic surgery in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over recent years an increasing level of advertising has focused on the benefits of plastic surgery.  This promotes a change in body image without a corresponding change in lifestyle, which is acknowledged to be unhealthy and psychologically damaging.  It also suggests that beauty is tied specifically to money.  As such it should not be promoted in public places.
